title: Write a React Theme With hexo
content:
hexo basic

how to create your own theme

(1) new a folder [newTheme] inside ‘themes’

(2) new a folder called ‘layout’ inside the [newTheme]

(3) create three basic .ejs template, including a ‘index.ejs’, a ‘layout.ejs’ and a ‘post.ejs’ for consisting the whole blog content. according this blog: create a custom blog theme with hexo

(4) modify your config to this new theme, and generate a blog with this theme, then run the server, you could see a very simple blog page renderd with your new theme: (add simple theme picture!!)

add react into your theme

(1) copy whatever a react simple starter kit downloaded from git or anywhere to your new theme folder, npm install

(2) modify ‘output’ inside ‘webpack.config.js’, and modify ‘scripts’ inside ‘package.json’. from: bundle.js is not generated
